description:
My place is close to Central Park Zoo, times square, The American Museum of Natural History, Guggenheim Museum, MOMA ( museum of modern art),Daniel, Bareburger, Socrates Sculpture Park, You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

This is my home and I sleep on the pullout bed because its very comfy and I love the natural light in the living room every day, plus the TV is big. You will love coming home to the clean and comfy space after a long day of sightseeing.

I am available all the time just give me a call or text on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)

10 minutes walk from the 6 train which goes uptown, downtown and across town to times square. You can walk to time square its about 30 minutes or take the bus/ metro which is about the same amount of time
name: UPPER EAST SIDE/, 2 bedroom, close to everything
review: The host canceled this reservation 117 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
